channel.title: PI horrible glitch
channel.description:
Okay, i just found out about this glitch because it just randomly started happening... when a player uses the snowglobe it gives them like a random amount of mith ores, rune ores, and or manta rays... and it also does it when they eat rocktails and tuna potatoes?... why is it doing this all of the sudden??
Help greatly appreciated, thanks!!!!

item.title: PI horrible glitch
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

Hmm have you incorporated a mystery box or something like that into your server?
